title: "This AI-based language teacher promises to improve your fluency and speak with confidence"
excerpt: "Gliglish is an AI-based platform that claims to improve your command over a new language. Check its features and how it works. Learning a new language can be difficult, especially in adulthood. It requires learning entirely new words and pronunciations and the right modulation to speak them."
